Name: Hero of Not Our Time
About the game: Hero of Not Our Time is a 2D top-down action game with elements of 90s classics. The player will have to move through neo-noir dungeons looking for a way out, simultaneously destroying various monsters using magic and weapon, cleaning up location after location. Got home from school or... kindergarten? Highkey angry ? - Log in, killed, Log out. ASSEMBLE UNIQUE WEAPON SAMPLE A bunch of details and no customization restrictions. CREATE MAGIC SPELLS USING YOUR OWN BLOOD Spiritism and rituals will heal you and make you stronger. IMPLANT ELECTRONIC STUFF RIGHT IN YOUR HEAD Different chips and improvements that might be connected to your skull will make your gameplay more fun and crazy. DISMEMBER CROWDS OF ENEMIES You will meet new enemies on your way, difficulty will increase over time. ULTRAVIOLENCE STIMULATION All that cruelty will be accompanied by energy EDM music in Synthwave and Darksynth genres.
